promptVersions.body:
Climate Action Dashboard provides insights into your organization's carbon emissions data that you can use to devise a climate action plan to reduce your emissions. The dashboards charts answer these questions:

  • What's the trend of location-based emissions and market-based emissions when compared to a previous period?
  • What's the distribution of emissions by source and country?
  • What are the top factors contributing to my organization’s overall emissions?
  • What’s the total energy and electricity consumed by my organization’s buildings?
  • What’s the total emissions from electricity consumption by city?
